医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
行业专家 Jafar Jafari 博士在 2023 年 UEG 周上介绍了新书《氢气和甲烷呼气测试基本指南》胃肠病学领域专家贾法尔·贾法里 (Jafar Jafari) 博士很高兴地宣布即将发布他的开创性著作《氢气和甲烷呼气测试基本指南》。在世界上最大的胃肠病学大会之一——2023 年 UEG 周上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Industry-expert-Dr-Jafar-Jafari-teases-new-book-氢气和甲烷呼吸测试基本指南- at-UEG-Week-2023.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Industry-expert-Dr-Jafar-Jafari-teases-new-book-氢气和甲烷呼吸测试基本指南- at-UEG-Week-2023.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90eb5f00-a543-4fd0-8615-352af408741d Wed, 11 Oct 2023 06:08:00 -0400 Industry expert, Dr. Jafar Jafari, teases new book, The Essential Guide to Hydrogen and Methane Breath Testing, at UEG Week 2023
益生元和益生菌对心血管和肾脏健康有积极影响吗？食用营养素、益生元和益生菌对增强心血管和肾脏健康的好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Do-prebiotics-and-probiotics-positively-impact-cardioangio-and-renal-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Do-prebiotics-and-probiotics-positively-impact-cardioangio-and-renal-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63b567d7-2b94-4fe4-ba5c-015ee9815e9a Wed, 11 Oct 2023 05:58:00 -0400 Do prebiotics and probiotics positively impact cardiovascular and renal health?
人工智能能否改变公共卫生营养？研究人员描述了人工智能 (AI) 在人口福祉和营养方面的应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Can-artificial-intelligence-transform-public-health-nutrition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Can-artificial-intelligence-transform-public-health-nutrition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65ff52e9-3ca9-4ea0-8895-3ac8274ceb51 Wed, 11 Oct 2023 05:32:00 -0400 Can artificial intelligence transform public health nutrition?
合成信息在医疗保健领域的适应性和前景潜力在医疗保健分析背景下人工生成的数据可能带来的好处和局限性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Adaptability-and-promising-pottial-of-synthetic-information-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Adaptability-and-promising-pottial-of-synthetic-information-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6139b4f-670c-47df-ae56-70b98205fc64 Wed, 11 Oct 2023 04:40:00 -0400 Adaptability and promising potential of synthetic information in healthcare
研究显示，炎症性疾病不会增加新冠病毒后的凝血风险加拿大研究人员发现，与没有免疫介导炎症性疾病 (IMID) 的患者相比，患有免疫介导炎症性疾病 (IMID) 的患者在从 COVID-19 康复后不会面临更高的静脉血栓栓塞事件风险。然而，某些合并症可能会影响这种风险，这凸显了个体化患者护理的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Inflammatory-diseases-dont-boost-clotting-risks-post-COVID-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Inflammatory-diseases-dont-boost-clotting-risks-post-COVID-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44a37110-0770-4705-8e09-d39aaf06c189 Wed, 11 Oct 2023 00:18:00 -0400 Inflammatory diseases don't boost clotting risks post-COVID, study reveals
抑郁症造成的沉重损失：揭示其对美国成年人整体健康的影响研究发现，美国成年人的抑郁症会显着增加死亡风险，尤其是心血管疾病的死亡风险。提高认识和治疗可以减轻影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Depressions-heavy-toll-Unraveling-its-impact-on-overall-health-in-US-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Depressions-heavy-toll-Unraveling-its-impact-on-overall-health-in-US-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1739673-7c2c-4527-b7c2-7019fabf914a Tue, 10 Oct 2023 23:55:00 -0400 Depression's heavy toll: Unraveling its impact on overall health in US adults
使用 INTEGRA 移液器推进神经毒性研究INTEGRA Biosciences 已向生物分析公司 DNTOX 授予 31 个 EVOLVE 手动移液器、价值 1000 美元的 GRIPTIPS® 移液器吸头和实验室配件，作为其最近的“INTEGRA 支持初创企业”竞赛的一部分，该竞赛一直持续到 2023 年 4 月。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Advancing-neurosteroidity-research-with-INTEGRA-pipettes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Advancing-neurosteroidity-research-with-INTEGRA-pipettes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=793ba75e-26e5-4d78-b116-f1a651e92cd1 Tue, 10 Oct 2023 23:40:00 -0400 Advancing neurotoxicity research with INTEGRA pipettes
纯素饮食对孩子来说是健康的选择吗？在《食品科学与营养批判评论》上发表的一篇综合评论中，科学家分析了纯素饮食对儿童和青少年的健康影响。该研究揭示了好处和担忧，强调胆固醇水平较低，但潜在的营养缺乏可能会影响骨骼健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Is-a-vegan-diet-a-healthy-choice-for-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Is-a-vegan-diet-a-healthy-choice-for-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c606a62c-cfd9-4a41-a7fa-2dbf35e6c3b0 Tue, 10 Oct 2023 23:30:00 -0400 Is a vegan diet a healthy choice for kids?
新的结核病疫苗接种策略可以挽救数十万艾滋病毒感染者的生命匹兹堡大学医学院的科学家们发现了一种结核病（TB）疫苗接种策略，可以预防全世界艾滋病毒感染者的主要死亡原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/New-TB-vaccination-strategy-could-save-hundreds-of-thousands-of-lives-with-HIV.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/New-TB-vaccination-strategy-could-save-hundreds-of-thousands-of-lives-with-HIV.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=236ab3c4-f902-4e6e-9cf9-ae8f15b7d41d Tue, 10 Oct 2023 22:56:54 -0400 New TB vaccination strategy could save hundreds of thousands of lives with HIV
脆性 X 综合征甚至在出生前就可能在脑细胞中显现脆性 X 综合征是遗传性智力障碍最常见的形式，甚至在出生前就可能在脑细胞中出现，尽管通常要到 3 岁或以后才被诊断出来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Fragile-X-syndrome-may-be-unfolding-in-brain-cells-even-before-birth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231010/Fragile-X-syndrome-may-be-unfolding-in-brain-cells-even-before-birth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ea75666-7981-4cb9-90cf-d1a596fae43c Tue, 10 Oct 2023 22:38:38 -0400 Fragile X syndrome may be unfolding in brain cells even before birth
